Action.Description: Buffs Position EDIT ME > Use visual guide for placement

Trigger.Name: ##INSTRUCTIONS -> Description tab##
Trigger.Description:
1. Copy Buffs Positions trigger to a local folder 2. Set that folder as your startup folder in the Triggernometry configuration (options dropdown > edit configuration; select the folder in the box at the bottom) 3. Open the local Buffs Positions trigger 4. Open the Buffs Position action 5. Click the Use visual guide for placement button 6. Move the overlay to where you want it to appear If you can't find it, hit Alt+F4 and set the X and Y location values to 0, then try again. Should be in the top left 7. Right click the overlay and click Save Changes 8. Click Save Changes 9. Click Save Changes again 10. You're done. Type "/e _buffs test" in game chat to test the overlay. Type "/e _buffs off" to turn them off.
You don't need to copy any of the other triggers locally, but you can enable/disable the ones in the Auras folder as you prefer. Note that Technical Finish will not work properly ifTechnical Step is not enabled
Features: - Shows cooldowns with blue text and saturated icons when buffs are up - Shows cooldowns with black text and desaturated icons when buffs are on cooldown - When buff is off cooldown but not used yet, desaturated icon remains, but cooldown text disappears - When technical step is up, shows a countdown showing how many dance steps are left before tech finish is ready - If a buff is used but misses the player, the cooldown will go straight to the desaturated/black text to indicate the buff missed them - Supports buff tracking of multiple of the same job - Auras will disappear upon changing zones - Cooldown text will disappear upon instance wipe, but auras will stay
Questions and bugs can be reported to Sable#1297 on Discord, but be noted I'm kind of a bitch, so sorry in advance.
